description:
Valentine`s Day is getting closer and all the boys and girls
are getting restless. And when the gang finds out Amami wants to try
her hand at home-made chocolate, they can`t help but wonder who it`s
for! Tune in for a sweet, emotional Valentine`s Day episode. You`ll
never believe who Amami`s heart really belongs to!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 秘密の, バレンタインです.
